name: Hero Turtle Kills a Wizard
description:
Pre-alpha build of our final project for our game dev class CITA 280. There will be more description here as we finish the game.

Story: You play as a resident of Turtle Village. Your village has lived peacefully for tens of thousands of years, but one day, some dickhead wizard set up shop at the end of The Forbidden Forest, and unleashed a hoard of dickhead demons. Your village has been terrorized by slightly-malicious pranks and japes ever since. Armed only with your shell, your slow wit, and the unwavering spirit of a hero, you set off on an adventure to kill the wizard.
